root.SelectSQL: select Id,TagId,CreateDate as InStorageDate from CMCSTBEPCCARD t order by TagId asc
root.CheckSQL: select Id from CMCSTBEPCCARD where TagId=:TagId
root.InsertSQL: insert into CMCSTBEPCCARD (ID, AUTOID, OPERDATE, OPERUSER, CREATEUSER, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSERID, CREATEUSERDEPTID, CREATEUSERDEPTCODE, CARDNUMBER, TAGID) values (:Id, null, :InStorageDate, 'admin', 'admin', :InStorageDate, '-2', '-1', '00', :CardNumber, :TagId)
